October 24, 2022
Oathful
Really thought this guy would be able to reduce penetrating damage or something, since Wonder Man's known for his resilience. The common version gets Invincible and the uncommon gets Invulnerability? Feels like they wanted you to run him with the +5 more than as his own figure. Regardless he's still a solid figure, that Mystics damage helps, but over some of the other 100 point characters his keywords have, there are better primary attackers to pick from. // Thematic: 7/10, Viability: 7/10, Fun Factor: 7, leans towards home-fun.
